snippet.title: Terraformers Game - Early Trailer (Sept. 2019)
snippet.description:
2023 Update: After 4 years the game is finally out and we have remade the same trailer with the latest gameplay footage and visuals from the game. We decided to leave this trailer up as a token of how far the game has come.

Here is the new trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zb-xnoOt6bI

You can now get the game on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244800/Terraformers/
Or follow us on twitter: @terraf_game 

We made this trailer mainly to apply for the "Interactive Media Projects" grant from Pro Helvetia (Switzerland). Let us know what you think!

Let's Terraform this Planet!
